description: This file is a configuration class for setting up auditing and filtering in a Spring Boot application, specifically for the internet banking utility payment service. It defines beans for auditor awareness and a custom authentication filter.

classes.name: AuditConfig
classes.description: Configuration class that sets up auditing and an authentication filter for the application.

methods.name: myAuditorProvider
methods.description: Provides an AuditorAware bean for auditing purposes, returning an instance of AuditorAwareConfig.

methods.name: authUserFilter
methods.description: Registers a custom filter for authentication, applied to URLs matching /api/*.
